data.name: IssueShiftsAccessToken
data.value: Unable to fetch shifts access token. Please try to relogin.

data.name: NullMonthPartitionsMessage
data.value: The month partitions are null. Please verify your data in Kronos accordingly
data.comment: The message to log into ApplicationInsights when the month partitions are null.

data.name: SetUpNotDoneMessage
data.value: Please verify workforce integration, user mapping, team department mapping are done and sync start date and end date are in "M/dd/yyyy" format where start date < end date.
data.comment: The message for checking the required setup tokens.

data.name: TeamDepartmentDetailsNotFoundMessage
data.value: The team-department details cannot be found. Check the Team-Department mapping and try again.
data.comment: The message when there are no team department mapping details found.

data.name: SetupStatusMessage
data.comment: The message to log to telemetry to show whether or not the setup has been completed.

data.name: UserTeamNotExists
data.value: Team does not exist for user

data.name: WorkforceIntegrationAdminNotFound
data.value: Unable to find the admin ID for workforce integration.
data.comment: The message that will be displayed when the Admin AAD Object ID is not found for a specific workforce integration.

data.name: InternalErrorCodeMessageText
data.value: An internal error occurred which may cause the open shift request to be declined.
data.comment: The text which further explains what is going on.

data.name: InternalErrorCodeText
data.comment: The text for the InternalErrorCode

data.name: GeneralErrorCode
data.comment: The overall general error code

data.name: GeneralErrorMessageText
data.value: An error has occurred, you may need to reissue your request again at a later time.
data.comment: A generic error message.

data.name: IncomingOpenShiftRequest
data.comment: The incoming open shift request details.

data.name: SyncApprovedOrDeclinedOpenShiftRequests
data.comment: The method in the OpenShiftRequest controller which syncs the approved or declined open shift requests from Kronos to Shifts

data.name: SyncOpenShiftsFromKronos
data.comment: The method name in OpenShiftController that will sync open shift entities from Kronos to Shifts.

data.name: CreateEntryOpenShiftsEntityMapping
data.comment: In the open shift controller, this method is responsible for creating an entry in the open shift mapping table

data.name: DeleteOrphanDataOpenShiftsEntityMapping
data.comment: In the open shift controller, this method deletes any orphan open shifts.

data.name: GetOpenShiftResultsByOrgJobPathInBatch
data.comment: In the open shift controller, this method processes users in a batch manner.

data.name: SyncShiftsFromKronos
data.comment: The method name in ShiftController that will sync shift entities from Kronos to Shifts.

data.name: ShiftsNotFoundtoSwap
data.value: No swap shifts found to process

data.name: SyncedFailed
data.value: Something went wrong while syncing the shifts.

data.name: GetShifts
data.comment: The method name in the ShiftController.

data.name: GetTimeOffs
data.comment: The method to get the time off entities in the TimeOffController.

data.name: ProcessOpenShiftsRequests
data.comment: The method to be able to process the open shift requests regardless if they have been approved or declined

data.name: EntityNotFoundWithRowKey
data.value: Unable to find the entity with the RowKey: {0}
data.comment: This is a message to be logged in the event that a temporary shift could not be found.

data.name: PayloadReceivedDoesNotMeetConditions
data.value: There was a payload received, but does not suffice any of the conditions for processing.
data.comment: This is a message to log to application insights saying that a payload has been received, but the payload does not meet any condition to be further processed.

data.name: RequestFromShiftsNotQualifiedToProcess
data.value: A request is coming in from Shifts, but does not meet the necessary criteria for further processing: {0}.
data.comment: This message is a generic logging message to track that a request is coming in from Shifts, but it does not meet a condition to be processed further. The {0} placeholder would be for the incoming request Id.

data.name: AadGroupIdIsMissing
data.value: The AAD Group Id (or the Team ID) is missing.
data.comment: The message that would be raised when the aadGroupId is null.

data.name: GenericNotAbleToRetrieveDataMessage
data.value: {0} - Data cannot be retrieved at this time.
data.comment: This message is a generic message that will be showing whenever data cannot be retrieved

data.name: TokenNotPresentWithCurrentRequest
data.value: Token is not present with the current request.
data.comment: The message that would be logged to Application Insights whenever there is a token related exception.

data.name: TokenOriginatingFromInvalidSource
data.value: The token required for this API call could be coming from an invalid source.
data.comment: This is a message that will be displayed if the token for the Web API is coming from a source that is not part of the deployed resources.

data.name: InvalidSwapShiftState
data.value: Swap Shift is not in pending with manager state. Swap Shift Request Id: {0}
data.comment: This is a telemetry logging for a Swap Shift Request that is not in a valid state for approval or decline. The {0} placeholder is for the SREQ, Swap Shift request ID.

data.name: NoSwapReqPending
data.value: No requests present in pending state.

data.name: OpenShiftNotFoundMessage
data.value: The open shift from MS Graph - {0} is not found.
data.comment: The {0} placeholder is for the Open Shift ID.
